H0.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Prescott

H1.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Flagstaff

H2.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Bisbee

H3.text: The OK Corral is in which US town. Tombstone

A4.text: Taking place in the town of Tombstone in Arizona Territory.

A5.text: The O.K. Corral fronted Allen Street and had a rear entrance lined with horse stalls on Fremont Street.
